duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and supervise associates to support a sales driving culture while creating a consistent customer experience.
Engage and connect with customers, providing excellent customer service through a hospitality-oriented approach.
Offer information on merchandise assortment, store promotions, and events, and execute operational processes effectively and efficiently.
Support sales, hospitality, operations, people, and conversion through the Shop C3 Program.
Lead key holder responsibilities, including opening and closing store processes, leading hospitality host, and providing direction to associates.
Drive sales by creating an inspiring environment that motivates customers to make purchases.
Deliver a consistent sales floor experience and build customer connections with a greeting and authentic hospitality experience.
Support sales floor, fitting room, point of sale, and operational processes, as required.
Ensure all customers feel respected, appreciated, and rewarded, and build trust to solve their shopping needs.
Leverage omni-channel offerings to deliver a frictionless customer experience and accurately deliver on operational processes.
Build rapport and make a genuine connection with the customer, acknowledging and assisting them through company programs.
Onboard, train, and develop associates, ensuring they are able to perform key accountabilities.
Complete transactions accurately and efficiently while engaging customers and promoting savings with a Kohl’s Card.
Conduct open and activating Kohl’s Card applications, and be courteous and responsive to requests and questions.
Maintain prompt and regular attendance, comply with dress code requirements, company policies, and receive, understand, and proactively respond to direction from managers and other company personnel.
Work as part of a team, interact effectively with others, and perform tasks in a fast-paced environment.
Satisfactorily complete company training programs, demonstrate basic math and reading skills, and operate and communicate on multiple frequency devices and technology equipment as directed.
Ability to withstand exposure to varying temperatures, humidity, and other elements while performing certain job duties.
